name: Sanguine Blade
tooltip:
Sanguine Blade

+50 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Frenzy: While near one or fewer visible enemy champions gain 8 lethality and 20% - 80% (based on level) bonus attack speed, decaying over 3 seconds if other enemy champions get too close (1350 radius).
